scenario_name: Return to The Doom of Eztli
full_name: Scenario II: Return to The Doom of Eztli

steps.text: Remove the original Burial Pit, Underground Ruins, Secret Passage locations from the game.
Replace the original Entryway, Ancient Hall, Grand Chamber, and Chamber of Time locations with the new versions from The Return to The Doom of Eztli encounter set.
Replace the original Harbinger of Valusia enemy with the new Harbinger of Valusia (The Sleeper Returns).

Create the exploration deck. This is done by taking Sealed Passage, Mosaic Chamber, Tomb of the Ancients, Throne Room, Snake Pit, Ancient Hall, and Grand Chamber and shuffling them together. Do not include any encounter cards listed in the original setup instructions.
Set the following cards aside, out of play: The Harbinger of Valusia enemy, the 3 Pit Viper cards from the Serpents encounter set, and the Chamber of Time location, and the Relic of Ages asset.
For the duration of this scenario, the following additional rule applies:

bullets.text: Forced - After a successful exploration ends: Shuffle the top card of the encounter deck into the exploration deck.

steps.text: Which investigator should add the "Mysterious Scepter" to their supplies?

supplies.name: Mysterious Scepter
supplies.description: A mysterious scepter you found in the throne room.
